law.catch_line: When an applicant complies with the filing requirements and pays the registration fee to the Commiss...

text.section: When an applicant complies with the filing requirements and pays the registration fee to the Commissioner in accordance with § 23-203 of this subtitle, the Commissioner shall determine whether the applicant meets the requirements of this title.
The Commissioner shall deny registration to an applicant if the Commissioner determines that the applicant has submitted an incomplete registration.
The Commissioner shall register each applicant that meets the requirements of this title.
